column1: A: The bill sunsets the individual tax breaks at the end of 2025 and Republicans also repealed the individual mandate a key part of the Affordable Care Act to help finance the bill.. B: It repeals Obamacare's individual mandate starting in 2019 - an item that was added during the negotiating process as lawmakers hunted for revenue sources they could use to pay for other rate cuts.
